title: Sonoma
name: Tiddle E. Winks
content: A super quirky and cool retro candy store that also sells vintage style Sonoma-wares such as pillows, coasters, glasses and other items with retro designs. A fun place to just pop in and grab a candy or real sugar drink from your childhood. Not from the US? This place is chock full of American-paraphernalia you'll love.
